titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: INVESTIGATION RESULT CODE (MOTHER RUBELLA SCREENING) - Description

div.p:
INVESTIGATION RESULT CODE (MOTHER RUBELLA SCREENING) is the result of the Clinical Investigation for 'Rubella Antibody' screening
for a mother in a Maternity Episode.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, the following National Codes are valid:
